channel.title: BIZKIT
channel.description: Bite sized, easy to digest stories from the world of business, economy, and finance.

item.title: Why Companies Use ESOPs: From Basics to Elon’s New Tesla Deal
item.dc:creator: Satvik Raman
item.description: We explain ESOPs, RSUs, vesting schedules, and performance pay—and decode why Tesla just granted Elon Musk $29 billion in stock to keep him onboard.

item.title: Tariffs: The Price Tag on Borders
item.dc:creator: Satvik Raman
item.description: Tariffs are back in the headlines, with the U.S. slapping a sweeping 25% duty on several Indian goods. But what exactly are tariffs, and why do countries impose them in the first place?

item.title: What Does a Depository Actually Do?
item.dc:creator: Satvik Raman
item.description: Behind every share you own, there’s a digital vault keeping it safe — that’s what a depository does. We explore how depositories like NSDL and CDSL form the invisible backbone of India’s stock market. With NSDL’s IPO around the corner, it’s the perfect time to understand the world of depositories — what they are, how they work, and why they matter.

item.title: Lehman Brothers and the Subprime Time Bomb
item.dc:creator: Satvik Raman
item.description: Subprime loans powered the housing boom of the early 2000s — until they shook the global financial system. What are subprime loans? And how did they bring down one of Wall Street’s oldest investment banks: Lehman Brothers.
